```{r Set parameters, load packages, etc.}
# TD: Make extra folder for reward / novelty!

n_actions = "4"  # can be 4 (2 levels), 8 (8 basic actions, 3 levels), 16 (16 basic actions, 4 levels), or 27 (27 basic actions, 3 levels)
learning_signal = "novelty"  # Can be "novelty" or "reward"
alpha = 0.15  # can be 0.7 or 0.15
plot_all_trials = T
gg_save = T

library("ggplot2"); library("plyr"); library("reshape"); library("gridExtra")
theme_set(theme_bw())
data_dir = "C:/Users/maria/MEGAsync/Berkeley/LEARN/data"
plot_dir = file.path(data_dir, "plots")
if (!dir.exists(plot_dir)) {
  dir.create(plot_dir)
}
```
```{r Read in data}
# Event history
event_hist = read.csv(file = file.path(data_dir, paste("event_history_long", n_actions, learning_signal, "alpha", alpha, ".csv", sep = "")), header = T)
event_hist$X = NULL
head(event_hist)
summary(event_hist)

# Value history
v_history = read.csv(file = file.path(data_dir, paste("v_history_long", n_actions, learning_signal, "alpha", alpha, ".csv", sep = "")), header = T)
v_history$X = NULL
head(v_history)
summary(v_history)

# State history
state_history = read.csv(file = file.path(data_dir, paste("state_history_long", n_actions, learning_signal, "alpha", alpha, ".csv", sep = "")), header = T)
state_history$X = NULL
head(state_history)
summary(state_history)

# Option history
option_history = read.csv(file = file.path(data_dir, paste("option_history_long", n_actions, learning_signal, "alpha", alpha, ".csv", sep = "")), header = T)
option_history$X = NULL
head(option_history)
summary(option_history)

# Theta history
theta_history = read.csv(file = file.path(data_dir, paste("theta_history_long", n_actions, learning_signal, "alpha", alpha, ".csv", sep = "")), header = T)
theta_history$X = NULL
theta_history = subset(theta_history, value != 0)
head(theta_history)
summary(theta_history)
```
```{r Plot actions options events and values over time}
if (plot_all_trials) {
  for (tr in 0:max(event_hist$trial)) {
    
    # Events/actions in each trial
    gg_event = ggplot(subset(event_hist, trial == tr), aes(action, factor(level))) +
      geom_tile(aes(fill = value), color = "white") +
      scale_fill_gradient(low = "black", high = "yellow") +
      theme(legend.position = "none") +
      facet_wrap(~ trial)
    
    # State in each trial
    gg_state = gg_event
    gg_state$data = subset(state_history, trial == tr)
    gg_state = gg_state +
      scale_fill_gradient(low = "black", high = "yellow")
    
    # Options in each trial
    gg_option = gg_event
    gg_option$data = subset(option_history, trial == tr)
    gg_option = gg_option +
      scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "steelblue") +
      facet_wrap(~ step)
    
    # Values in each trial
    gg_value = gg_event
    gg_value$data = subset(v_history, trial == tr)
    gg_value = gg_value  +
      scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "red", limits = c(0, 1))  # necessary to make each plot based on the same color
    
    # Thetas in each trial
    for (op in unique(theta_history$option)) {
      theta_dat = subset(theta_history, option == op & updated_option == op & trial == tr)
      if (nrow(theta_dat) > 0) {
        gg_theta = gg_value
        gg_theta$data = theta_dat
        gg_theta = gg_theta +
          aes(action, feature) +
          scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "red", limits = c(-1, 1))  # necessary to make each plot based on the same color
        
        # Put theta-option graphs together
        grob_theta_option = grid.arrange(gg_theta, gg_option, gg_state, ncol = 1)
        
        file_path = file.path(plot_dir, paste(n_actions, "grob_theta_option", op))
        if (!dir.exists(file_path)) {
          dir.create(file_path)
        }
        if (gg_save) {
          ggsave(file.path(file_path, paste("trial", tr, ".png", sep = "")), grob_theta_option, width=max(event_hist$action)/2, height=3*max(event_hist$level))
        }
      }
    }
    
    # Put value-option-event graphs together
    grob_event_value = grid.arrange(gg_value, gg_option, gg_event, ncol = 1)
    
    file_path = file.path(plot_dir, paste(n_actions, "grob_event_value"))
    if (!dir.exists(file_path)) {
      dir.create(file_path)
    }
    if (gg_save) {
      ggsave(file.path(file_path, paste("trial", tr, ".png", sep = "")), grob_event_value, width=max(event_hist$action)/2, height=3*max(event_hist$level))
    }
  }
}
# Events, selected trials
gg_event_multi = gg_event
gg_event_multi$data = subset(event_hist, trial < 10 | trial > (max(trial) - 10))
gg_event_multi = gg_event_multi + facet_wrap(~ trial)

# Options, selected trials
gg_option_multi = gg_option
gg_option_multi$data = subset(option_history, trial < 10 | trial > (max(trial) - 10))
gg_option_multi = gg_option_multi + facet_wrap(~ trial)

# Values, selected trials
gg_value_multi = gg_value
gg_value_multi$data = subset(v_history, trial < 10 | trial > (max(trial) - 10))
gg_value_multi = gg_value_multi + facet_wrap(~ trial)

if (gg_save) {
  ggsave(file.path(file_path, "gg_event_multi.png"), gg_event_multi, width=6, height=4)
  ggsave(file.path(file_path, "gg_option_multi.png"), gg_option_multi, width=6, height=4)
  ggsave(file.path(file_path, "gg_value_multi.png"), gg_value_multi, width=6, height=4)
}
```

```{r Plot novelty values over time}
gg_summary_novelty = ggplot(v_history, aes(trial, value, color = factor(action), group = level)) +
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_se", geom = "pointrange") +
  stat_summary(fun.y = "mean", geom = "line", color = "black") +
  geom_line(aes(group = action)) +
  coord_cartesian(y=c(0, 1), x=c(0, 350)) +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  facet_grid(~ factor(level, levels = unique(v_history$level), labels = paste("Level", unique(v_history$level))))
if (gg_save) {
  ggsave(file.path(plot_dir, paste(n_actions, "gg_summary_novelty.png", sep = "")), gg_summary_novelty, width = 6, height = 3)
}
```
```{r Plot option features over time}
gg_summary_theta = ggplot(subset(theta_history, option %in% 0:5 & feature %in% 0:5), aes(trial, value, color = factor(action))) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_grid(option ~ feature)
if (gg_save) {
  ggsave(file.path(plot_dir, paste(n_actions, "gg_summary_theta.png", sep = "")), gg_summary_theta, width = 10, height = 5)
}
```

```{r Plot option values over time}
th0 = subset(theta_history, option == 0 & feature %in% 0:7 & action %in% 0:7)

gg_features_over_time = ggplot(th0, aes(trial, value, color = factor(action))) +
  geom_point(position = "jitter", alpha = .3) +
  facet_grid(~ feature)

gg_actions_over_time = ggplot(th0, aes(trial, value, color = factor(feature))) +
  geom_point(position = "jitter", alpha = .3) +
  facet_grid(~ action)

tiles_opt = expand.grid(feature = 0:max(theta_history$feature), option = 0:max(theta_history$option), action = max(theta_history$action))
tiles = subset(theta_history, trial == max(th0$trial) & option %in% 0:2 & action %in% 0:9)
gg_final_policies = ggplot(tiles, aes(feature, factor(action))) +
  geom_tile(aes(fill = value), colour = "white") +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "white", high = "steelblue") +
  facet_grid(~ option)

if (gg_save) {
  ggsave(file.path(plot_dir, paste(n_actions, "gg_features_over_time.png", sep = "")), gg_features_over_time, width = 10, height = 5)
  ggsave(file.path(plot_dir, paste(n_actions, "gg_actions_over_time.png", sep = "")), gg_actions_over_time, width = 10, height = 5)
  ggsave(file.path(plot_dir, paste(n_actions, "gg_final_policies.png", sep = "")), gg_final_policies, width = 10, height = 5)
}
```
